name: The Wishing Stone (DreamNyghtStudio)
description:
The Wishing Stone is a point & click puzzle adventure game with challenging puzzles. It's also a mystery visual novel with a touching family story. Different choices and what you do while exploring/solving puzzles can lead you to different endings. 

Ailsa unexpectedly receives a wishing stone from a suspicious witch. According to the witch, the wishing stone could grant her 3 wishes, but she must make the first one before midnight. Unfortunately a simple wish leads to unexpected developments.

 Nothing is what it seems and Ailsa soon realizes there are inconsistencies and lost pieces  in her memory and the world around her slowly derails away from the reality. Is she in a bad dream? How can she get back to her normal life?

Welcome to Ailsa's adventure as she goes on a journey to stay away from troubles, find out the truth and get her lost memory and normality back. 

You will guide her to explore, collect items, solve puzzles and make choices. She might find the truth or she might sink into the darkness. Her fate depends on you!

Point and click puzzle adventure with interesting and challenging puzzles .

An original story with twists and turns in visual novel style with 120,000 words.  

Diaries/ letters to read and lots of details to explore in the environment.  Learn more about the characters and the world little by little through exploration. 

 Choices to make and 7 different endings to reach. There's also a special chapter after reaching one of the true ends.

We have put hints in the game in puzzle interface, here's also a link to the walk-through if you ever get stuck on any puzzles or doesn't know how to reach the true ends. 

https://dreamnyghtstudio.wixsite.com/thewishingstone/walk-through
